channel.title: Help with mageing in a safezone
channel.description: Alright I have added a safe zone it mage arena surrouned by trees with a little gap for people to get out and into the wildy. You cannot melee people in safezone or range them but you can mage them in safe zone if your in the wildy or in the safezone does anyone know how I can fix this??

item.title: Help with mageing in a safezone
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

There are a few sources with this bug, just switch it and C&P the stuff u wana keep

Read full topic
item.source: Help with mageing in a safezone
